omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
with results as (
			select distinct
			(select PatientId from omop_staging.rtds_1_demographics d where d.PatientSer = PatientSer limit 1) as NhsNumber,
			Treatmentdatetime,
			Cast(NominalEnergy as double) / 1000 as CalculatedNominalEnergy,
			NominalEnergy as NominalEnergy
		from omop_staging.RTDS_4_Exposures
		)
		select
			NhsNumber,
			Treatmentdatetime,
			CalculatedNominalEnergy,
			NominalEnergy
		from results
		where
			NhsNumber is not null
			and regexp_matches(NhsNumber, '\d{10}');

omopColumns.name: observation_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `4045098`. External beam radiation therapy beam energy

omopColumns.name: observation_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. EHR administration record

omopColumns.name: value_as_number

dataSource.name: CalculatedNominalEnergy
dataSource.description: RADIOTHERAPY PRESCRIBED BEAM ENERGY  is the prescribed beam energy of a Radiotherapy Exposure used in External Beam Radiotherapy
